680.name: Mental Anguish
680.description: <c=@abilitytype>Shatter</c> skills deal more damage. This bonus damage is doubled against foes that are not activating skills.

681.name: Imagined Burden
681.description: Greatsword skills other than the Spatial Surge gain recharge reduction and inflict cripple. Phantasmal Berserker summons an additional berserker but deals less damage.

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

685.name: Illusion of Vulnerability
685.description:
Inflict vulnerability when you interrupt a foe.
This trait can only affect enemies with defiance bars once per interval.

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

686.name: Confounding Suggestions
686.description: Chance to inflict stun whenever you daze a target. Increased stun and daze duration.

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

693.name: Shattered Concentration
693.description: <c=@abilitytype>Shatter</c> skills also remove a boon on hit.

694.name: Dazzling
694.description: Dazing a foe also applies vulnerability.

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

712.name: Furious Interruption
712.description: Gain quickness when you interrupt a foe.

facts.description: Skills and actions are faster.

713.name: Blurred Inscriptions
713.description: <c=@abilitytype>Signets</c> gain reduced recharge, and activating one grants you distortion and removes conditions.

facts.description: Immune to conditions and damage.

1688.name: Power Block
1688.description:
Interrupts deal damage and inflict weakness. Enemy skills that you interrupt have an increased cooldown.
Cannot increase recharge of skills with no recharge or skills on creatures with defiance bars.
This trait can only damage enemies with defiance bars once per interval.

facts.description: Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.

1941.name: Fragility
1941.description: Deal more damage for each stack of vulnerability on your target.

738.name: Restorative Mantras
738.description: Heals allies around you when you finish preparing a <c=@abilitytype>Mantra</c>.

740.name: Restorative Illusions
740.description: Heal yourself and lose conditions when you use a <c=@abilitytype>Shatter</c> skill.

744.name: Sympathetic Visage
744.description: <c=@abilitytype>Phantasms</c> take your conditions when they are first summoned.

751.name: Warden's Feedback
751.description: Focus weapon skills reflect projectiles. Reduces recharge on focus weapon skills.

752.name: Temporal Enchanter
752.description: <c=@abilitytype>Glamour</c> skills last longer, and casting one grants nearby allies resistance and superspeed.

facts.description: Movement speed is greatly increased.
Conditions currently on you are ineffective; stacks duration.

756.name: Medic's Feedback
756.description: Cast Feedback while reviving an ally. Your revival speed is increased.

skills.name: Feedback
skills.description: Glamour. Create a dome around you that reflects projectiles.

757.name: Mender's Purity
757.description: Cast Lesser Power Cleanse when you use a healing skill.

skills.name: Lesser Power Cleanse
skills.description: Remove conditions from you and nearby allies.

1852.name: Inspiring Distortion
1852.description: Grant aegis to other nearby allies whenever you give yourself distortion.

facts.description: Block the next incoming attack; stacks duration.

1866.name: Illusionary Inspiration
1866.description:
Summoning a phantasm casts Lesser Signet of Inspiration and grants might to nearby allies.
Signet will not cast if you have no boons to share.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

skills.name: Lesser Signet of Inspiration

facts.description: Block the next incoming attack; stacks duration.
Skills recharge faster.
Critical Chance increased by 20%; stacks duration.
Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.
Incoming damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.
Gain health every second; stacks duration.
Reflect incoming damage back to its source; stacks duration.

Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.
Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.

Skills and actions are faster.

skills.description: Signet. Apply one instance of any boon on you to nearby allies.

1915.name: Healing Prism
1915.description: When healing yourself, nearby allies are also healed. Gain healing power based on a portion of your power.

facts.description: Block the next incoming attack; stacks duration.

2005.name: Mental Defense
2005.description: Cast Lesser Phantasmal Defender on your attacker when you successfully block or evade an attack.

skills.name: Lesser Phantasmal Defender

facts.description: Involuntarily attack foes.
Involuntarily attack foes.

skills.description: Phantasm. Summon an illusion that taunts your target and all nearby targets while blocking attacks. It explodes when it finishes blocking, dealing increased damage for each attack blocked.

1838.name: Delayed Reactions
1838.description: Interrupting a foe slows them and grants you alacrity.

facts.description: Skills and actions are slower.
Skills recharge faster.

1859.name: Time Marches On
1859.description: You move 25% faster. The duration of incoming movement-impairing conditions is reduced by 25%.

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.
Movement speed decreased by 66%; skill cooldown increased by 66%; stacks duration.
Unable to move; stacks duration.

1890.name: Chronophantasma
1890.description:
The first time a phantasm would become a clone, it instead resummons itself and attacks again. Resummoned phantasms inflict a percentage of the original's damage.
(Resummoned phantasms are briefly dazed.)

1913.name: Illusionary Reversion
1913.description: <c=@abilitytype>Shatter</c> skills generate a clone if you have enough clones present.

1927.name: Flow of Time
1927.description: Gain alacrity for each clone you shatter.

facts.description: Skills recharge faster.

1942.name: Lost Time
1942.description: Gain a charge each time you score a critical hit. After enough charges, your next hit will slow your target and deal bonus damage.

facts.description: Skills and actions are slower.

1978.name: Improved Alacrity
1978.description: Alacrity applied to you is stronger but has a reduced duration.

1995.name: Time Catches Up
1995.description: Activating a <c=@abilitytype>Shatter</c> gives your illusions superspeed. Shatters deal increased damage to movement-impaired foes.

facts.description: Movement speed is greatly increased.

2009.name: Danger Time
2009.description: Gain additional critical-hit chance against slowed enemies. Critical hits deal additional damage to slowed enemies.

facts.description: Skills and actions are slower.

2022.name: Seize the Moment
2022.description: Gain quickness for each clone you <c=@abilitytype>shatter</c>.

facts.description: Skills and actions are faster.

2030.name: Time Splitter
2030.description: Gain access to Continuum Split/Shift, which allows you to revert to an earlier point in time. Gain access to <c=@abilitytype>Wells</c>.

skills.name: Continuum Split
skills.description: Destroy all your clones and create a rift in the space-time continuum. When it expires, you will revert back to this point with your previous health, endurance, and skill recharges. Duration increases per illusion shattered.

traited_facts.description: Conditions currently on you are ineffective; stacks duration.

skills.name: Continuum Shift
skills.description: Revert back to the previous timeline. Your health, endurance and cooldowns are reverted to their previous states. You are transported back prematurely if the rift is destroyed.

691.name: The Pledge
691.description: Reduces recharge on torch skills. Flame bursts from torch skills inflict additional burning.

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

skills.name: Mind Wrack
skills.description: Shatter. Destroy all your clones, damaging nearby foes. The shatter effect also occurs at your location.

722.name: Escape Artist
722.description: Create a clone when you gain stealth.

723.name: Compounding Power
723.description: Creating an illusion increases your outgoing damage and gives increased condition damage for a short duration.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage and condition damage per stack.

729.name: Phantasmal Haste
729.description: <c=@abilitytype>Phantasms</c> spawn with quickness. Gain quickness when you create a phantasm.

facts.description: Skills and actions are faster.
Skills and actions are faster.

733.name: Phantasmal Force
733.description: <c=@abilitytype>Phantasms</c> deal increased damage for each stack of might you have. Gain might when your phantasms become clones.

facts.description: Phantasm damage increased per stack.
Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

734.description: <c=@abilitytype>Cry of Frustration</c> inflicts more stacks of confusion for an increased duration.

facts.description: Damage received on skill activation; stacks intensity.

skills.description: Shatter. Destroy all your clones, confusing nearby foes. The shatter effect also occurs at your location.

traited_facts.description: Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.

Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

753.name: Malicious Sorcery
753.description: Increases attack speed while wielding a scepter. Reduces recharge on scepter skills.

facts.description: Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to moving foes. Stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to moving foes. Stacks intensity.

1869.name: Persistence of Memory
1869.description: When a <c=@abilitytype>phantasm</c> becomes a clone, it transfers its boons to you.

facts.description: 25% Increased Critical-Hit Chance
Cripples foes on hit.
Strikes up to five targets within range.
Reflects Projectiles

traited_facts.description: Slow nearby foes when returning to the original time line.

692.name: Superiority Complex
692.description:
Your critical hits deal more damage. Critical hit damage against disabled foes, or foes below the health threshold, is further increased.
Disabled foes are affected by stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, fear, taunt, or launch.

700.name: Duelist's Discipline
700.description:
Pistol attacks from you and your illusions have a chance to cause bleeding. Interrupting a foe recharges pistol skills.
This trait can only reduce recharge on enemies with defiance bars once per interval.

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Critical Chance increased by 20%; stacks duration.

704.name: Deceptive Evasion
704.description: Create a clone at your current position when you dodge.

705.name: Desperate Decoy
705.description: Cloak and leave a clone of yourself behind if you take damage while below the health threshold.

skills.name: Decoy

facts.description: Currently invisible. Ends if you deal damage.
